Touchless Tipping

TipYo is a secure mobile tipping solution partnering with hospitality companies to enable travelers to safely express their gratitude to service staff while practicing physical distancing.

For

Hospitality Companies

TipYo provides a mobile tipping solution for your guests and an affordable human resource benefit for your staff.

Learn More
For

Travelers

The TipYo App enables you to securely tip staff at participating locations.

Learn More

Use Your Phone to Securely Tip

Step 1

Open the TipYo App

Step 2

Select or customize your tip amount

Step 3

Select participating location

Step 4

Choose staff to tip

Step 5

Enter your room number or staff person's name

Step 6

Chose payment method and confirm tip

Who Benefits from Touchless Tipping? Everyone!

Travelers

  • Convenience from mobile phone.
  • No more hunting for loose bills; tip based on level of service — not what's in your wallet.
  • Secure
  • Safe — no direct contact needed.

Associates

  • Associates get recognized and rewarded for their hard work.
  • Increased take home pay.
  • Solves the headwinds that cashless society has on their income.
  • Eliminates direct contact between guests and associates.

Hospitality Companies

  • Meeting guests' expectations
  • Affordable human resource benefit.
  • Payment integration with payroll system to meet IRS and regulatory requirements.
  • Partner with a company that has significant experience in financial payments.
  • Meets revised standard of care guidelines.

Who Carries Cash Anymore?

Checking out of your hotel room, and can’t find that $5 bill for the hotel staff that made your stay extra special? Learn how TipYo can make sure that person gets the recognition they deserve all from our secure mobile app.
